    Json Object representing a screen and all its data; is the screen currently loaded into the program A screen contains three categories of information: meta, sizing, cells Reference screen type for more information

    static Type
    screensType
    Contains type of screens hash map, used to convert screensJsonObject to a hash map Outer String key refers to the screen name of an individual screen, pulled from the screen's meta data
    static Type
    screenType
    Contains type of screen hash map, used to convert screenJsonObject to a hash map String key represents the name of a category of information pertaining to the screen Inside Object value represents the actual information referenced by the key.

  • Field Details

    • screensFilePath

      public static String screensFilePath
      relative file path to file containing screens Json Object

    • screenJsonObject

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject screenJsonObject
      Json Object representing a screen and all its data; is the screen currently loaded into the program A screen contains three categories of information: meta, sizing, cells Reference screen type for more information

    • screensJsonObject

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject screensJsonObject
      represents the json object of screens. screens is pulled from this screens contains all the screens in a given json file reference screens type for more information

    • s

      public static Scanner s
      scanner is initialized as a member var so it can be used throughout the class

    • gson

      public static com.google.gson.Gson gson
      gson is initialized as a member var so it can be used throughout the class used to convert Json Objects to their Object counterparts (mainly hash maps)

    • screenType

      public static Type screenType
      Contains type of screen hash map, used to convert screenJsonObject to a hash map String key represents the name of a category of information pertaining to the screen Inside Object value represents the actual information referenced by the key. This information is stored in a dictionary

    • screensType

      public static Type screensType
      Contains type of screens hash map, used to convert screensJsonObject to a hash map Outer String key refers to the screen name of an individual screen, pulled from the screen's meta data

    • metaDataType

      public static Type metaDataType
      Contains type of metaData hash map, used to convert metaData Json Object to a hash map
